00021 // struct constructor
00022 SlaveInterface::Bridge::Bridge(QDomNode& bridgeNode): masterRef_(),
00023 opaque_(false) {
00024 
00025         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = bridgeNode.attributes();
00026         masterRef_ = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:masterRef")).
00027                         nodeValue();
00028         masterRef_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(masterRef_);
00029 
00030         QString opaque = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:opaque")).
00031                         nodeValue();
00032         opaque = General::removeWhiteSpace(opaque);
00033 
00034         opaque_ = General::str2Bool(opaque, false);
00035 
00036         // if mandatory elements are missing
00037         if (masterRef_.isNull()) {
00038                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:masterRef"
00039                                 " is missing in spirit:bridge"));
00040         }
00041 
00042         if (opaque.isNull()) {
00043                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:opaque is "
00044                                 "missing in spirit:bridge"));
00045         }
00046         return;
00047 }

00049 // struct constructor
00050 SlaveInterface::FileSetRefGroup::FileSetRefGroup(QDomNode& fileSetNode):
00051                                                         group_(), fileSetRefs_() {
00052 
00053         // go through child nodes
00054         for (int i = 0; i < fileSetNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00055                 QDomNode tempNode = fileSetNode.childNodes().at(i);
00056 
00057                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:group")) {
00058 
00059                         // strip whitespace characters
00060                         group_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00061                         group_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(group_);
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileSetRef")) {
00065 
00066 
00067                         // strip whitespace characters
00068                         QString temp = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00069                         temp = General::removeWhiteSpace(temp);
00070                         fileSetRefs_.append(temp);
00071                 }
00072         }
00073         return;
00074 }
00075 
00076 // class constructor
00077 SlaveInterface::SlaveInterface(QDomNode& slaveNode):
00078                                                         memoryMapRef_(), bridges_(), fileSetRefGroup_() {
00079 
00080         // go through all child elements
00081         for (int i = 0; i < slaveNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00082                 QDomNode tempNode = slaveNode.childNodes().at(i);
00083 
00084                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:memoryMapRef")) {
00085                         // the wanted value is an attribute
00086                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00087 
00088                         // strip whitespace characters
00089                         memoryMapRef_ = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00090                                         "spirit:memoryMapRef")).nodeValue();
00091                         memoryMapRef_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(memoryMapRef_);
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:bridge")) {
00095                         bridges_.append(QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface::Bridge>(
00096                                         new SlaveInterface::Bridge(tempNode)));
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileSetRefGroup")) {
00100                         fileSetRefGroup_.append(
00101                                         QSharedPointer<SlaveInterface::FileSetRefGroup>(
00102                                                         new SlaveInterface::FileSetRefGroup(tempNode)));
00103                 }
00104         }
00105         return;
00106 }

00111 }

00113 SlaveInterface::SlaveInterface( const SlaveInterface& other ):
00114 memoryMapRef_(other.memoryMapRef_),
00115 bridges_(),
00116 fileSetRefGroup_() {
00117 
00118         foreach (QSharedPointer<Bridge> bridge, other.bridges_) {
00119                 if (bridge) {
00120                         QSharedPointer<Bridge> copy = QSharedPointer<Bridge>(
00121                                 new Bridge(*bridge));
00122                         bridges_.append(copy);
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 
00126         foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup> refGroup, other.fileSetRefGroup_) {
00127                 if (refGroup) {
00128                         QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup> copy = QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup>(
00129                                 new FileSetRefGroup(*refGroup.data()));
00130                         fileSetRefGroup_.append(copy);
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 }

00135 SlaveInterface& SlaveInterface::operator=( const SlaveInterface& other ) {
00136         if (this != &other) {
00137                 memoryMapRef_ = other.memoryMapRef_;
00138 
00139                 bridges_.clear();
00140                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Bridge> bridge, other.bridges_) {
00141                         if (bridge) {
00142                                 QSharedPointer<Bridge> copy = QSharedPointer<Bridge>(
00143                                         new Bridge(*bridge));
00144                                 bridges_.append(copy);
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147 
00148                 fileSetRefGroup_.clear();
00149                 foreach (QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup> refGroup, other.fileSetRefGroup_) {
00150                         if (refGroup) {
00151                                 QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup> copy = QSharedPointer<FileSetRefGroup>(
00152                                         new FileSetRefGroup(*refGroup.data()));
00153                                 fileSetRefGroup_.append(copy);
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         return *this;
00158 }

00160 SlaveInterface::~SlaveInterface() {
00161         bridges_.clear();
00162         fileSetRefGroup_.clear();
00163 }

00165 void SlaveInterface::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00166         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:slave");
00167 
00168         // if optional element is not empty
00169         if (!memoryMapRef_.isEmpty()) {
00170                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:memoryMapRef");
00171                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:memoryMapRef", memoryMapRef_);
00172         }
00173 
00174         // write all spirit:bridge elements
00175         for (int i = 0; i < bridges_.size(); ++i) {
00176                 writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:bridge");
00177 
00178                 // if mandatory element is missing
00179                 if (bridges_.at(i)->masterRef_.isEmpty()) {
00180                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element masterRef missing"
00181                                         " in spirit:bridge"));
00182                 }
00183                 else {
00184                         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:masterRef",
00185                                         bridges_.at(i)->masterRef_);
00186                 }
00187                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:opaque", General::bool2Str(
00188                                 bridges_.at(i)->opaque_));
00189         }
00190 
00191         // write all filesetRefGroups
00192         for (int i = 0; i < fileSetRefGroup_.size(); ++i) {
00193                 // write the name of the group
00194                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:group",
00195                                 fileSetRefGroup_.at(i)->group_);
00196 
00197                 // write all the fileSetRefs for this group
00198                 for (int i = 0; i < fileSetRefGroup_.at(i)->fileSetRefs_.size(); ++i) {
00199                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:fileSetRef",
00200                                         fileSetRefGroup_.at(i)->fileSetRefs_.at(i));
00201                 }
00202         }
00203         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:slave
00204 }

00225         // delete old bridge elements

00241 bool SlaveInterface::hasBridge() const {
00242 
00243         // if a bridge exists
00244         if (bridges_.size() != 0) {
00245                 return true;
00246         }
00247         return false;
00248 }
